product_desc: Hint Fatale Extrait de Parfum merupakan parfum dengan aksen aroma yang misterius dan menggoda dengan mudah menjadi pusat perhatian. Perpaduan aroma tembakau yang terbakar terbuat dari pala (nutmeg), olibanum, dan patchouli dari Indonesia, sementara wangi vanilla dan kayu manis menyatu dengan kulit. Dengan AdrenalineScent Technologyâ„¢, wewangian ini mengandung beberapa minyak esensial yang secara empiris dapat membunuh bakteri.How to use: Semprotkan pada area denyut nadi seperti di belakang telinga dan pergelangan tangan. Untuk wangi yang lebih complex, semprotkan Hint Parfum. Dapat disemprotkan ke baju dan kulit dengan jarak 15-20 cm.Suitable for: Unisex. Fragrance notes: Top : blackpepper, nutmeg. Middle : cinnamon, red fruit, olibanum. Base : tobacco, patchouli Indonesia, vanilla, Java vetiver

main accords: white floral-honey-sweet-patchouli-citrusThe first fragrance from the Lebanese haute couture designer is simply called Le Parfum. After 279 trial versions, an ultra-feminine, flowery-woody composition has been selected, signed by perfumer Francis Kurkdjian. The perfume opens with notes of orange blossom. The campaign features the famous model Anja Rubik. Le Parfum is available as 30, 50 and 90 ml Eau de Parfum with an accompanying collection that includes perfumed deodorant, body lotion, body cream and shower gel. Le Parfum was launched in 2011.

One of life's simple pleasures.Fresh as flowers after a Spring rain, this sheer, shimmering floral is a spirited blend of Lilies, White Peonies and Jasmine, all tingling with the rare essence of exotic Baie Rose.Never sweet, ever fresh, it delights your senses with pleasure after pleasure.Top Notes:White Lily, Violet Leaves, Green AccentsMiddle Notes:Black Lilac, White Peony, Karo-Karounde Blossoms, Baie Rose, Pink Rose, JasmineBase Notes:Sandalwood, PatchouliTHE INSPIRATIONCreated in 1995, EstÃ©e Lauder Pleasures set the trend for uplifting, airy fragrances and introduced the Sheer Floral fragrance type.Evelyn Lauder created it to have a sheer, elusive, luminous quality. It captures the clarity of flowers just after a spring rain. This wonderful fragrance has been one of best selling fragrances for many years.`Whatever the fragrance was to be, I wanted it to have an elusive, textural quality,` said Evelyn Lauder. `And we have achieved it with EstÃ©e Lauder Pleasures. For the first time, there is a fragrance that unfolds like a flower in the warmth of the sun, surrendering its scent little by little.`0.5 oz. - USD 301.7 oz. - USD 623.4 oz. - USD 85

Marc Jacobs presents Decadence, his first "mature" fragrance in 2015. Each of his pillar fragrances represents a distinctive character: Daisy is a sweet girl next door, Lola is quirky, and Decadence is sexy and sophisticated.The rich and elegant composition was created in collaboration with perfumer Annie Buzantian. The top notes include Italian plum, saffron and iris. Bulgarian rose, Sambac jasmine and orris root form the heart of the perfume, while the base includes warm liquid amber, vetiver and papyrus wood.The bottle design, which is a "personal talismanâ€ of the designer as a symbol of opulence and glamour, is reminiscent of an emerald green handbag with python pattern, gold chain and black tassel. Introduced in 2003. Fragrance notes: a fresh bouquet of soft, white flowers. Recommended use: evening.When applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and, in turn, the way a scent smells on you.  For instance, your mood, stress level, age, body chemistry, diet, and current medications may all alter the scents you wear.  Similarly, factor such as dry or oily skin can even affect the amount of time a fragrance will last after being applied

Oriflame launches new luxurious fragrance for women named Possess. Announced as a sensual and hypnotic fragrance of a graceful seductress, it is inspired by the legend of Cleopatra and Mark Antony. The composition belongs to the category of chypre floral fragrances with fruity additions. It contains over 80 ingredients, with only dominant listed.Daphne Bugey and Dora Baghriche-Arnaud signed this creation. The scent opens with accords of pineapple, grapefruit and freesia. The heart captures orange blossom, ylang-ylang as a major accord, and sweet raspberry. The base is made of sandalwood from Sri Lanka, patchouli and vanilla from Madagascar.

The fragrance was presented in 2003, packed in a pink transparent bottle and box. It is available as 125 ml EDT, along with the additional bath and deodorant collection. Guess for Women was launched in 2006. The nose behind this fragrance is Maurice Roucel.

Lancome launches La Nuit Tresor fragrance in February 2015. The scent is a flanker of the original Tresor from 1990.The composition is announced as a gourmand aphrodisiac and a love potion created by perfumers Christophe Raynaud and Amandine Marie. It supposedly depicts the dark side of rose and mixes notes of black rose with Tahitian vanilla orchid absolute. There are also accords of natural incense, papyrus, patchouli and litchi praline added to the mix.The faces of the campaign are PenÃ©lope Cruz and Ilay KureloviÄ‡ and photo signed by Mert Alas and Marcus Piggott. Video campaign directed by Rob Marshall.The bottle is decorated with a diamond-shaped satin black rose and bow. The fragrance is available as 30, 50 and 100 ml Eau de Parfum.La Nuit Tresor was created by Christophe Raynaud and Amandine Clerc-Marie.

Aroma ini diawali dengan kesegaran pink pepper, pear, dan orange blossom, kemudian berkembang ke dada white flowers seperti jasmine, bitter almond, licorice, dan bahkan kopi sebagai sentuhan menggoda. Dior Sauvage Eau de Parfum adalah wewangian pria yang terinspirasi oleh gurun saat matahari terbenam. Untuk Sauvage Eau de Parfum, House of Dior telah memilih aroma vanila istimewa dari Papua Nugini. Sebuah momen yang diwarnai dengan nuansa biru pekat, ketika dinginnya malam berpadu dengan panasnya gurun.

SAFF & Co. Extrait de Parfum Irai Leima merupakan aroma yang membawa Anda pada perjalanan sensorik udara laut segar dan perairan tenang. Saat aroma awal memudar, IRAI LEIMA mengungkapkan aroma lembut Duchesse de Nemours, yang ditentukan oleh rona bunga, kemerahan, dan lembut serta sedikit aroma jeruk. Aroma lembutnya diperkuat dengan iris air, yang menambahkan dimensi lembut dan bubuk pada aromanya. Penambahan Raat ki Rani memberikan rasa floral yang manis dan sedikit pedas. IRAI LEIMA dengan lembut menyatu dengan dasar yang hangat dan nyaman, di mana kelembutan lembut ambrette berpadu sempurna dengan aroma air yang mistis dan kuno, meninggalkan kesan mendalam dan ketenangan yang abadi

Fame dari Lady Gaga adalah wewangian Oriental Floral untuk wanita. Fame diluncurkan pada tahun 2012. Aroma teratasnya adalah Dupa, Belladonna, dan Kunyit; aroma tengahnya adalah Madu dan Aprikot; aroma dasar adalah Anggrek dan Melati.

This perfume scent has a lot of unique things that go into making it very citrusy while still offering a fresh, sweet, and even fruity note. It is aimed at young women and it sparks the idea that the woman wearing it is spontaneous and feeling flirty. The main things you will notice when you spray it is the candied apples and vanilla that make up its delightful scent. These two main notes are further enhanced by the scent of white cedar and musk. Are you ready to prove your spontaneity?

British boy band One Direction was formed in 2010 as a result of the reality TV show X-Factor. Off the coast of Italy, the island of Pantelleria is a place where the deep blue-green Mediterranean Sea meets the sun and earth, creating a sense of happiness, serenity, and optimism. This fresh, aquatic fragrance, whose name means, `water of joy,` captures the simple happiness one can experience at this extraordinary destination. The fragrance's top notes rise like a soft sea breeze, bringing forward a sensual blend of cool mint, warm brown sugar, and the zest of Italian lemon. Next, the heart notes emerge with beautiful floral hints of jasmine, dew of peony, and traces of pink pepper. The base lingers on a uniquely Mediterranean trail of cedarwood and the complex, herbaceous accords of labdanum.

"A timeless fragrance trail of rose and oud wood to taste the infinite desert. The desert possesses a singular magic that captivates travelers. At dawn, the sunâ€™s first rays blend the dunes and the sky, night and day, and the earth and clouds into a majestic pink. Fascinated by the harmony that springs from contrasts, the Master Perfumer Jacques Cavallier Belletrud has composed a hot and cold perfume playing with two exceptional qualities of rose and oud. Its simple, limpid script underscores the natural beauty and richness of two of perfumeryâ€™s most legendary ingredients. The freshness of rose and the woody depths of oud exalt one another, borne aloft by a warm swirl of ambergris."rose - oud - amber - warm spicy - floral - fresh spicy - animalic-Centifolia rose absolute -Bulgarian rose essence-Oud Wood-Ambergris-Black Pepper-Saffron

The man, firelight in his face, leaning on the worn leather saddle, alone with the desert windâ€”an icon so powerful that every man wanted to be him and every woman wanted to have him. From this memory is born Santal 33, the ambition to create an olfactive form inspired by the great American myth that is still a source of fantasy for the rest of the world. A perfume that touches the sensual universality of this icon, that would intoxicate a man as much as a woman. It introduces the brand's use of cardamom, iris, violet and ambrox, which crackle in the formula and bring to this smoking wood alloyâ€”Australian sandalwood, papyrus, cedarwoodâ€”some spicy, leathery, musky notes and gives this parfum its unisex signature and addictive comfort. Here is, in a few words, what Santal 33 is. An open fire. The soft drift of smoke. Where sensuality rises after the light has gone.

Eros pour Femme Eau de Parfum adalah wewangian Versace terbaru yang mengekspresikan kekuatan, karakter, dan daya tarik. Daya tarik, hasrat, gairah. Eros dalam sebuah parfum. Sebuah perpaduan aroma menggoda, bercahaya, dan feminin dengan lemon Sisilia, bergamot Calabria, dan biji delima untuk memukau dan menggoda, parfum ini menampilkan perpaduan halus lemon dan melati yang menyampaikan feminitas autentik dan abadi. Deep Garden dari Zara adalah wewangian untuk wanita. Ini adalah wewangian baru. Deep Garden diluncurkan pada tahun 2023. Aroma teratas adalah Pir; aroma tengah adalah Tuberose; aroma dasar adalah Kacang Tonka.

1 Million is one of the most popular fragrances launched in last several years. After the edition for men, women's version inspired by gold and wealth was expected. Two years after men's edition, fragrant lady finally appears - Lady Million! We can just assume if this lady wants to earn millions or look like a million dollar. It is perfectly clear that the woman represented by this edition radiates, dominates and possesses fiery character with incredible sensuality.Flacon of Lady Million is in tune with composition and theme of this edition. Instead of gold bullion, the flacon for women is designed as a golden diamond. While insinuating luxury and wealth, the fragrance prepares a surprising composition of intertwined floral, fresh and woody accords. Only diamond can compete with gold, so Lady Million is the perfect companion to modern and masculine 1 Million.The Notes of FragranceAnne Flipo, BÃ©atrice Piquet and Dominque Ropion have all created scents for some of the biggest names in perfumery. But what path did they take to create Lady Million? â€œIt was clear that this perfume had to be as charismatic as 1 Million, with as strong a signature, yet without a direct olfactory link. The Lady Million woman is dazzling, always seductive. This â€˜playfulâ€™ aspect inspired us immensely. Lady Million is fresh, floral and woody, like a nectar of voluptuous flowers, trailing delicately but still very present. Powerfully seductive, the sparkle of bitter orange with a touch of raspberry reveals the first breath. A burst of neroli follows, smooth and bright. But then the lethal weapon of heady orange blossom slips out of its sheath. Its narcotic sweetness bewitches and grabs all attention. Then, joining with Arabian jasmine underlined by gardenia, the blend soars into something more carnal, yet ever subtle. Now the obsessive pulsing of patchouli enters the fray, pacifying the honey with an addictive and terribly tempting sweetness. Amber spreads to become all enveloping, floating around the beauty, following each movement and offering its most beautiful facetsâ€.Designer of the attractive, luxurious flacon is Noe Duchaufour-Lawrance. The perfume will be available as 30, 50 and 80ml edp.We can expect the fragrance on the market in July 2010. Lady Million makes men's fantasy and desires come true. Advertising face is Dree Hemingway. Lady Million was created by Anne Flipo, Beatrice Piquet, Dominique Ropion and Bruno Jovanovic.

Among the first perfume creations of the house of Givenchy stands the legendary scent of L'Interdit from 1957, dedicated to actress Audrey Hepburn as the most significant muse of this fashion designer. In 2018, its new, modern version called L'Interdit Givenchy comes out, developed by perfumers Dominique Ropion, Anne Flipo and Fanny Bal as a floral-woody composition. The perfume is built on the basis of contrast between a bouquet of white flowers (including jasmine, tuberose and orange blossom) and intense woody and earthy notes of patchouli and vetiver. The concept behind the creation is the "thrill of the forbidden" and the challenge of crossing the line.ACTIVE INGREDIENTS:"A white floral exalted with a dark accord. The first resolutely underground flower.The white notes - orange blossom, jasmin and tuberose - are interlaced with darker more mysterious notes of vetiver and patchouli.A generous intense brightness that isnâ€™t afraid of subversion.Unforgettable, intense, addictive and fearlessly elegant. The shocking side of chic."The bottle of thick glass pays homage to the original shape with a more modern outline with the 4 G logo added to the black ribbon that encircles the neck. The face of the new L'Interdit release is actress Rooney Mara. Givenchy L'Interdit is available in 35, 50 and 80 ml Eau de Parfum.

Mykonos Tea Poetry Extrait De Parfum merupakan perjalanan puitis yang membangkitkan segudang emosi dengan setiap nada halusnya. Di babak terakhirnya, "Tea Poetry" mengungkapkan warna aslinya saat manisnya madu berpadu dengan aroma teh hitam asap yang tersisa. Mykonos Hawaiian Crush Extrait De Parfum mengeluarkan ledakan indra yang penuh seni, yang membawa Anda ke lanskap Hawaii yang mempesona. Di tengah angin sepoi-sepoi, aromanya berubah menjadi perpaduan sensual antara musk beludru dan dupa yang memabukkan, membangkitkan romansa, gairah, dan mistik matahari terbenam di Hawaii. Menghangatkan diri dari udara musim semi yang segar, semburat merah muda di pipi perlahan dihangatkan oleh seteguk sake Sakura yang dibuat secara khusus dan menghangatkan diri dari dalam ke luar. From the Mediterranean, epicentre of harmonies and contrasts, the classic perfume, Dolce&Gabbana Pour Femme, is reborn embodying the essence of the Dolce&Gabbana woman â€“ passionate, sensual and maternal. For the woman that is aware of her strength and her instincts. The Dolce&Gabbana Pour Femme bottle is a little masterpiece of luxury; a bottle of purity, compact with precise angles lending an image of absolute elegance, which blossoms enticingly into a crimson coloured cap supported by a solid base of gold. The seductive, soft and soothing neroli intertwined with nuances of raspberry, is given a playful lift with a hint of tart green mandarin. A heart of voluptuous sensuality, a softly undulating perfume of potent florals â€“ velvety jasmine melting into the citrus sweetness of orange blossom. The addictive and seductive qualities of the sugary â€˜Guimauveâ€™ introduce the full bodied sensuality of the vanilla base notes. This captivating feature of the perfume is further lit up by the roundness of heliotrope and the smooth intense cream sandalwood.

Prada Infusion d'Iris is a contemporary eau de parfum that reinforces Prada's connection with the artisan traditions of classic perfumery. The name Infusion d'Iris is inspired by the ancient and revered six-month-long infusion process used to draw soft, fresh notes from the root of the iris plant.

In the same way matcha tea is much more than just a drink in Japanese culture, THÃ‰ MATCHA 26 is much more than a scent to us. It is a moment of introspection, a moment of self that offers a quiet inner celebration of grace and soulful beauty. A simple whiff takes us away from the hum of the outside and brings us back â€œinâ€.Matcha tea accord is infused with a creamy fig note, grounded by soft vetiver and textural cedar woods and uplifted by enticing bitter orange.Introverted and deep by nature, THÃ‰ MATCHA 26 is a skin scent, something meant for, and only those individuals lucky enough to be very close to, the wearer. It carries a noble stillness. To us, it is a scented reminder of home, of welcomed solitude, and of all things familiar and treasured.Fragrance Notes:Matcha Tea, Fig, Vetiver, Bitter Orange, Cedar

Saff & Co. Morfosia Extrait de Parfum merupakan parfum dengan sentuhan asam rhubarb yang mengingatkan pada rumput yang baru dipotong berpadu sempurna dengan Yuzu yang cerah dan jeruk, MORFOSIA dibuka dengan aroma lembut namun segar. Elletaria bertindak sebagai base notes, melembutkan tepi rhubarb dan jeruk, menciptakan karakter bulat dan seimbang secara harmonis. Spicy ginger yang dipadukan dengan madu manis membuat aromanya mengalir mulus dari cerah hingga bunga subur di tengahnya, membangkitkan nuansa manis, hangat namun menyegarkan. Setelah beberapa waktu, Narcissus menyelimuti Anda dengan rona hijaunya yang semakin diperkuat oleh Cape Jasmine, menambahkan karakter bunga putih yang sedikit manis. Middle notes ini menghasilkan perpaduan hangat dan bunga yang dilengkapi dengan sedikit rempah. Manisnya amber yang menenangkan, aroma kayu cedar merah yang segar, dan kekayaan asap dari akar wangi yang berpadu menciptakan aroma dasar yang hangat dan bersahajaâ€”aroma menawan yang tidak hanya bertahan tetapi juga merangkul. How to use: emprotkan pada titik nadi seperti pergelangan tangan dan leher Anda dari jarak sekitar 6-8 inci. Hindari menggosok wewangian karena dapat mengubah aroma. Oleskan pada kulit kering untuk hasil yang tahan lama dan pertimbangkan untuk mengaplikasikannya kembali sepanjang hari jika diperlukan. Suitable: Unisex. Fragrance notes: Top Notes: Rhubarb, Yuzu, Elletaria. Middle Notes: Shogayu, Narcissus, Cape Jasmine. Base Notes: Amber, Red Cedar, haiti Vetiver.

Mercredi Perfumery La PoÃ©si merupakan parfum beraroma seperti dongeng, mantra ajaib yang memanjakan sensualitas mawar dan aroma kayu dari hutan lebat. Manisnya bunga mawar yang bermekaran di bagian pembuka sangat menyenangkan dan menggoda seperti lagu sirene. Ini menarik para pendengarnya untuk memasuki dunia magis yang tak terbatas. Kayu oud dan kunyit mengambil alih untuk mengungkapkan rahasia di hutan terlarang. Saat matahari terbenam, sinar merah muda dan ungu muncul. Dulunya hanya mitos, berubah menjadi romantisme tanpa akhir dengan kepedasan lada hitam dan ambergris yang hangat. Wangi yang tak lekang oleh waktu bagi mereka yang menghargai keindahan alam dan keceriaan cinta. How to Use:Wangi parfum diintensifkan oleh kehangatan tubuh. The top notes unleash notes of incense, elemi, lemon and pink pepper, forming a half-spicy, half-green blend that issues floral hints and a touch of French lavender. The olfactory journey draws to a close with cashmere wood, vanilla, balsam of Peru and white musk. Fresh yet warm, traditional yet rock â€˜nâ€™ roll, understated yet full of personality, 702 is a fragrance of contradictions that will appeal to the curious at heart.Top: Incense, Pink Pepper, LemonHeart: Lavender, Cashmere wood, CedarBase: Balsam of Peru, Vanilla, White MuskHow to use:Spritz on pulse points like wrists, neck, behind ears, and inner elbows to make your fragrance last longer.Ingredients: Alcohol denat., parfum (fragrance), aqua (water), benzyl benzoate, benzyl cinnamate, citral, coumarin, limonene, linalool. 79% vol.

With Damask rose essence and absolute, this fragrance reveals fresh and floral notes. Our perfumer Alexandra Monet added green and spicy cardamom to the top notes. How about a walk along the beach, with hot sand and coconut trees? 103 is the ultimate sundrenched scent! It is sure to whisk you far away with its accords of tiare flower, hibiscus and white sand. HMNS Untitled Humans Aroma 02 merupakan sebuah karya parfum yang lahir dari filosofi mendalam tentang kehidupan manusia, menggambarkan kesederhanaan, kejujuran, dan perjalanan pencarian yang penuh makna. Pada dasarnya, Aroma 02 adalah sebuah refleksi tentang sisi kita yang paling autentik â€“ sisi yang tidak terikat oleh kerumitan, melainkan oleh keindahan yang sederhana. How to use: 1. Mohon semprotkan parfum dari jarak 10-15 cm dari area kulit Anda. 2. Aplikasikan pada titik-titik nadi seperti pergelangan tangan, leher, dan belakang telinga untuk hasil aromatik yang lebih tahan lama. 3. Harap hindari aktivitas menggosok pada area yang telah disemprot untuk mempertahankan ketahanan aroma. 4. Untuk menjaga kualitas parfum, mohon simpan botol di tempat yang teduh dan terlindung dari paparan sinar matahari. Suitable for: Unisex. Fragrance Notes: Top Notes: Annise, Rose Absolute. Colombian actress Sofia Vergara, best known for her role in the TV series `Modern Family`, launched her first fragrance in collaboration with Parlux, simply called Sofia. The fragrance includes notes and scents favored by the actresses, representing her true olfactory signature.The composition is announced as a juicy floral - oriental. It is created by perfumer Bruno Jovanovic. Top notes include juicy blackberry, sparkling cassis buds and plum. Flowers of violet, Colombian rose and Colombian orchid are laid on the base of sandalwood, vanilla and earthy woods.The bottle is designed to look like a cut emerald, only instead of green, it is colored in soft pink. The fragrance is available as 50 and 100 ml Eau de Parfum. Sofia was launched in 2014.

The nose behind this fragrance is Francoise Caron.

An absolutely essential and utterly irresistible perfumed creation.Like the cut of a dress, this fragrance is shaped with all of Guerlains finesse. Its simple signature enhances and romances several exceptional materials in a bold overdose. Black cherry blinks the first wink. It is illustrated by a clever blend that extends exquisite almond and delicious berries. The second wink takes place as rose enters the stage. Finally, the shadowy temptations of licorice and smoky black tea reveal more of me and lead to irresistible seduction. For the ultimate temptation, the entire creation is wrapped in Guerlinade. Fresh, enigmatic and exhilarating Mischievous and captivating I am the warm spark beneath the sweetness. I am absolutely essential and utterly irresistible. I am the chic and very seductive, perfumed creation by Guerlain.

The Body Tale Spice Nomad EDP merupakan wewangian memancarkan perpaduan menawan antara rempah, asap, dan rayuan. Aroma kaya kayu manis hangat berpadu dengan daya tarik smoky cerutu dan manisnya sari apel. Kayu manis yang sangat seimbang membangkitkan esensi shisha apel Mediterania, menciptakan aroma buah yang berasap, manis, dan lembut. Meskipun tidak dapat disangkal maskulin, aroma ini menawarkan kehangatan nyaman yang membuat ketagihan dan tak terlupakan. How to use:Semprotkan pada titik nadi seperti pergelangan tangan dan leher Anda dari jarak sekitar 6-8 inci. Hindari menggosok wewangian karena dapat mengubah aroma. Oleskan pada kulit kering untuk hasil yang tahan lama dan pertimbangkan untuk mengaplikasikannya kembali sepanjang hari jika diperlukan. Suitable:Unisex Fragrance notes:Top Notes: Apple, Smoke, Cinnamon Middle Notes: Tobacco, Moss, Vetiver Base Notes: Vanilla

A vibrant, uplifting and distinctly contemporary fragrance distinguished by liberal use of Basil Grand Vert and fresh citrus notes.Tacit was born of two key inspirations: the fresh notes of traditional colognes and the culture, topography and fragile perfumed vegetation of the Mediterranean coast. Verites After the Rain EDP merupakan parfum dengan aroma klasik bagaikan trench coat - tidak akan pernah ketinggalan zaman. Ibarat berjalan sore di taman yang terletak di jantung Kota Inggris setelah hujan: awan yang menggantung, harumnya bebungaan, dedaunan, pepohonan dan tanah yang basah oleh air hujan.  How to use: Jaga agar posisi botol tetap tegak, semprotkan Verites dengan jarak 10-15cm pada kulit di titik- titik nadi, seperti pergelangan tangan, bagian dalam siku, belakang leher, dan belakang paha. Hindari menggosok parfum karena akan menghancurkan molekul parfum dan mengakibatkan kurang tahan lama.  Suitable for: Unisex.  Fragrance Notes: Top notes | Almond, Chocolate, Black Currant. Middle notes | Cedarwood, Tuberose, Sambac Jasmine. Base notes | Amber, Sandalwood

Mercredi Perfumery La RÃªverie merupakan parfum yang mewujudkan harta karun yang pernah dilarang untuk ditemukan. Rasanya manis, hangat, dan entah bagaimana menggoda. Cotton Flower atau Bunga Kapas berasal dari bahasa Arabic (al) qutn dan mulai digunakan oleh manusia sejak 7000 tahun yang lalu di dataran Indus atau yang dikenal saat ini sebagai perbatasan India dan Pakistan.Sebagai bagian dari Pohon Kapas, Cotton Flower dikenal akan kelembutannya namun juga sensitive terhadap suhu dingin, karenanya sangat cocok untuk tumbuh di daerah tropis yang hangat akan sinar matahari. Cotton Flower mengandung unsur kimia gossypol, yang bisa mengurangi efek stress dan darah tinggi, terutama pada wanita.Karakter Aroma dari White Cotton sangat soft / lembut seperti aroma bedak atau talk. Sangat disukai oleh wanita dengan sifat yang feminin tapi tidak mengarah ke unsur sexy. Biasanya disukai oleh wanita muda antara 18 30 tahun.

Parfum ini menggabungkan keharuman segar dan mewah yang memikat hati dan meninggalkan kesan yang menawan. Dalam setiap semprotan parfum ini, kalian akan merasakan wangi yang terus melekat pada kulitmu sepanjang hari.  How to use :Semprotkan parfum pada area yang diinginkan. Suitable for :Women. Fragrance Notes :Top notes : Mandarin, Pineapple, Lemon, AntilloneMiddle notes : Lily, Honeysuckle, Plum, GardeniaBottom Notes : Patchouli, Amber, Musk

Verites Blooming Amoure EDP merupakan parfum mempesona yang menceritakan mekarnya kisah cinta bagaikan bunga di tengah taman. Manisnya raspberry dan blackcurrant, pedasnya jahe yang menyegarkan, melambangkan percikan dan kegembiraan yang membara saat cinta mulai bersemi. Saat mendalami wewangiannya, aroma sedap malam yang kaya dan lembut muncul, menyelimuti indra dalam pelukan yang memabukkan. Bunga melati yang halus dan romantis semakin menyempurnakan Blooming Amoure, memberikan sentuhan lembut pada komposisinya. Saat cinta bersambut, seluruh alam semesta menjadi lengkap - tercermin dari musk dan cendana di nada dasar - penutup sempurna untuk Blooming Amoure. Memberi kenyamanan dan kegembiraan, seperti cinta.  How to use: Jaga agar posisi botol tetap tegak, semprotkan Verites dengan jarak 10-15cm pada kulit di titik- titik nadi, seperti pergelangan tangan, bagian dalam siku, belakang leher, dan belakang paha. Hindari menggosok parfum karena akan menghancurkan molekul parfum dan mengakibatkan kurang tahan lama.  Suitable for: Unisex.  Fragrance Notes: Top notes | Ginger, Carnation, Green Leaves. Middle notes |  Tuberose, Jasmine. Base notes | Musk, Sandalwood

Girl of Now Forever dari Elie Saab adalah wewangian Floral Fruity untuk wanita. Girl of Now Forever diluncurkan pada tahun 2019. Inspirasi di balik wewangian ini adalah Dominique Ropion. How to use:Semprotkan pada area denyut nadi seperti di belakang telinga dan pergelangan tangan. Untuk wangi yang lebih complex, semprotkan Hint Topper Eau de Parfum. Can you feel that lust for life from the first sprays? The bright and crisp fruits in the top notes titillate the floral touches of bergamot for real invigoration. With green apple and blackcurrant leaf, the fragrance begins with a fresh botanical dimension, conjuring up an imaginary garden. The heart presents a magnificent bouquet of magnolia, freesia, marigold and lily of the valley, which lend the creation harmony with their soft and elegant floral notes. The woody intensity of cedar and vetiver is mingled with musks to extend the wear of this ethereal fragrance.Top: Bergamot, Granny smith, Blackcurrant leaf, PearHeart: Magnolia, Freesia, Tagete, Lily-of-the-valleyBase: Cedar, Vetiver, MuskHow to use:Spray onto pulse points like the wrists, neck, behind the ears, and the crook of the elbow to make your fragrance last longer.Ingredients:Alcohol denat, water, fragrance, butylph'nyl, m'thylpropional, salicylate de benzyle, limon'ne, hydroxycitronellal, linalool, citral,benzyl benzoate, citronellol. 82% vol.

According to the house of Escada, Escada S is a very special fragrance. It is intended for any occasion, any place on Earth, wherever you are, Escada S is the right choice. Designers of this fragrance wanted to create a perfume that celebrates adventurous spirit; â€˜whether ski-ing the slopes of Aspen, exploring the museums of Rome, or mixing the perfect champagne cocktailâ€¦â€™This a fragrance created to colour every moment, whatever you do, wherever you are. Sights, Style, Socialising and Surroundings. Escada S is ment for a woman that lives her life to the fullest; she brings color to her surroundings and to her inner-self. Escada S follows fashion trends which dictate; dare to mix the unmixable, accept diversity in any form.The composition that celebrates adventure and free spirit opens with with plum and blackcurrant combined with elegant rose. The floral heart blends almond blossom, rose and muguet spiced with red pepper. The deep base melts mahogany, sandalwood, musks and hazelnut.The bottle is elegant and modern that radiates with pulsating energy and liveliness of the world. It is available in 30ml, 50ml and 90ml Eau de Parfum bottles accompanied by bath and body products. More information on www.escada-fragrances.com.Denis Boudard signs the design. Escada S was launched in 2007.

AYODYA Saat hujan mulai turun menjadi gerimis lembut, Anda mengambil peralatan berkebun dan melangkah keluar, siap untuk melakukan pekerjaan hari itu. Di saat-saat tenang di sela-sela tugas, Anda berhenti sejenak untuk memperhatikan hal-hal yang terjadi di sekitar Anda: seekor kepik berjalan melintasi daun, sekelompok semut berkerumun di dekatnya, dan lebah berpindah dari satu bunga ke bunga lainnya. Ayodhya adalah nafas yang dihirup saat berjalan-jalan di taman mawar setelah mandi air hujan yang menyegarkan, dimana aroma bunga mawar berpadu dengan aroma dedaunan yang lembap. Itu adalah pengingat akan indahnya hidup How to use :Semprot atau oles eau de parfum pada titik-titik nadi, seperti pergelangan tangan, leher, dan belakang telinga, lalu biarkan mengering secara alami.Hindari menggosokkan pewangi ke kulit karena dapat mengubah aroma dan menyebabkannya menguap lebih cepat.Untuk memastikan aromanya bertahan lebih lama, oleskan pelembap bebas pewangi ke titik nadi sebelum mengoleskan eau de parfum. Suitable for :Unisex Fragrance notes:Top : Rose, Blackcurrant, Lavender Heart : Jasmine, Cedarwood, MuskBase : Lily of the valley
